https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r9Afm0v1dkRUNdMcskU8Sgaf0eo.jpg After a failed marriage, Richard is in search of his daughter Mindy. He meets Sasha, an aspiring actress who promises to help him. But the hope to get some quick cash by performing in a 24 hours play soon turns out to be a bloody game. Die in One Day
